name: GitHub
description: Integrate with GitHub and receive related events
instructions:
### Enable

To enable this integration, you will be asked:
- to accept the GitHub App permissions, and
- select a GitHub organisation to install into.

Once you have installed the app, you will be redirected back to complete the integration by choosing which team to link the app to.

### Disable

To disable this integration, you can either
- remove the GitHub App installation from your GitHub organisation, or
- unlink the app by reopening this integration modal and selecting 'disable'
